certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

nx.description: The shared object has NX bit set. This marks a memory page non-executable making attacker injected shellcode non-executable.

stack_canary.description: This shared object has a stack canary value added to the stack so that it will be overwritten by a stack buffer that overflows the return address. This allows detection of overflows by verifying the integrity of the canary before function return.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object has full RELRO enabled. RELRO ensures that the GOT cannot be overwritten in vulnerable ELF binaries. In Full RELRO, the entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) is marked as read-only.

rpath.description: The shared object does not have run-time search path or RPATH set.

runpath.description: The shared object does not have RUNPATH set.

fortify.description: The shared object does not have any fortified functions. Fortified functions provides buffer overflow checks against glibc's commons insecure functions like strcpy, gets etc. Use the compiler option -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 to fortify functions.

nx.description: The shared object has NX bit set. This marks a memory page non-executable making attacker injected shellcode non-executable.

stack_canary.description: This shared object does not have a stack canary value added to the stack. Stack canaries are used to detect and prevent exploits from overwriting return address. Use the option -fstack-protector-all to enable stack canaries.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object does not have RELRO enabled. The entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) are writable. Without this compiler flag, buffer overflows on a global variable can overwrite GOT entries. Use the option -z,relro,-z,now to enable full RELRO and only -z,relro to enable partial RELRO.

file_analysis.finding: Certificate/Key files hardcoded inside the app.

playstore_details.title: QIB Mobile
playstore_details.description:
Enjoy doing more with QIB Mobile app. Available 24/7, QIB Mobile allows you to access all your accounts, check your finance status, perform many activities on your cards, transfer money locally and internationally, pay for your utility bills and more. 
QIB Mobile is available to all QIB Individual customers with an active ATM Card and PIN. As soon as you download and install the application, you can create your username and password to enjoy a seamless banking experience.

FEATURES
•	Login using your Touch ID
•	View all your current and saving accounts and fixed deposits
•	Check the status of your finance 
•	Check the status of your investments
•	View accounts transaction history
•	Transfer funds locally and internationally
•	View all your debit, charge and credit cards, settle early payments, view transactions 
history, activate/deactivate your cards and enable cards’ Magnetic stripe for international use
•	View and Pay your bills/Top up Ooredoo, Vodafone and Kahramaa
•	Locate the nearest QIB Branch or ATM and book a visit to meet your teller or Customer Service representative
•	Check foreign currency exchange rates 
•	Update your contact details

SECURITY AND PRIVACY
QIB Mobile Banking is secure and safe. We have introduced the two factor authentication using the One-Time-Password authentication (OTP) to further secure your banking account. OTP will be received either by SMS to your registered mobile number or by downloading QIB Aman app to be used upon logging in to your account and upon performing a banking transaction.
Your account information is not and will not be stored anywhere on your device. We have also implemented the latest security technologies. We are committed to your privacy and account details safety. See our online privacy policy on www.qib.com.qa
playstore_details.summary: QIB Mobile App allows you to enjoy the convenience of banking anytime, anywhere.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: QIB Mobile App allows you to enjoy the convenience of banking anytime, anywhere.
playstore_details.recentChanges:
With this update:
•	Introducing the Direct Remit Service to India 
•	Improvements on Beneficiaries management
•	General enhancements on the Transfer experience and the App performance
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
With this update:
• Introducing the Direct Remit Service to India
• Improvements on Beneficiaries management
• General enhancements on the Transfer experience and the App performance
